text: Köping Basket, also known as Köping Stars, is a basketball club based in Köping, Sweden. The club was founded in 2003, but changed its name for the men's team to Köping Stars in January 2018. The club plays its home games in the Karlbergshallen. Since the 2018–19 season, Stars plays in the Basketligan, the highest tier of basketball in Sweden. ==Players== ===Current roster=== ==Honors== Total titles: 2 *Superettan **Champions (1): 2017–18 *Basketligan **Third place (1): 2019–20* ==References== Category:Basketball teams established in 2003 Category:Basketball teams in Sweden
title: Köping Basket
